title: BlackRock Expands Client Voting in Shareholder Elections
description: The money manager said it will let more clients vote individually in companiesâ€™ elections, as it faces criticism of its own shareholder power.
dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Ravi Mattu, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Stephen Gandel, Michael J. de la Merced, Lauren Hirsch and Ephrat Livni
